trans-unit.source: Clicking **Connect** creates and downloads a Remote Desktop Protocol file (.rdp file).
trans-unit.target: Clicking **Connect** creates and downloads a Remote Desktop Protocol file (.rdp file).

trans-unit.source: In the Remote Desktop window, click **Connect** to continue.
trans-unit.target: In the Remote Desktop window, click **Connect** to continue.

trans-unit.source: In the Windows Security window, type the credentials for an account on the virtual machine and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: In the Windows Security window, type the credentials for an account on the virtual machine and then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the local account user name and password that you specified when you created the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: In most cases, the local account user name and password that you specified when you created the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the domain is the name of the virtual machine and it is entered as *vmname*\*username*.
trans-unit.target: In this case, the domain is the name of the virtual machine and it is entered as *vmname*\*username*.

trans-unit.source: If the virtual machine belongs to a domain at your organization, make sure the user name includes the name of that domain in the format *Domain*\*Username*.
trans-unit.target: If the virtual machine belongs to a domain at your organization, make sure the user name includes the name of that domain in the format *Domain*\*Username*.

trans-unit.source: The account will also need to either be in the Admnistrators group or have been granted remote access privledges to the VM.
trans-unit.target: The account will also need to either be in the Admnistrators group or have been granted remote access privledges to the VM.

trans-unit.source: If the virtual machine is a domain controller, type the user name and password of a domain administrator account for that domain.
trans-unit.target: If the virtual machine is a domain controller, type the user name and password of a domain administrator account for that domain.

trans-unit.source: Click **Yes** to verify the identity of the virtual machine and finish logging on.
trans-unit.target: Click **Yes** to verify the identity of the virtual machine and finish logging on.

trans-unit.source: Verify the identity of the machine
trans-unit.target: Verify the identity of the machine
